glosses: a placeholder vulgarity used to express the same or similar sentiments as above

examples.text: "Sen o ehliyetini nerden aldın?" "Ananın amından aldım!"
examples.translation: "Where'd you get that driver's license of yours, huh?" "I got it from your mother's pussy!"

etymology: From ana (“mother”) + -n (possessive suffix) + -ın (genitive suffix) + am (“pussy”) + -ı (possessive suffix), literally “your mother’s pussy”.
